name: CVSS (Cascaded Voice Style Synthesis)
description: Speech synthesis benchmark evaluating voice quality, naturalness, and style transfer capabilities for text-to-speech and voice conversion tasks.

metrics.name: mos
metrics.definition: Mean Opinion Score for naturalness and quality
metrics.calculation: Average human rating (1-5 scale) of speech naturalness

metrics.name: similarity
metrics.calculation: Cosine similarity between target and generated speaker embeddings

test_method: Evaluate speech synthesis models on voice quality, naturalness, and style transfer. Models generate speech from text with specified voice characteristics and style parameters.
notes: CVSS evaluates cascaded voice style synthesis including prosody transfer, emotion expression, and speaker adaptation. Commonly used for TTS and voice conversion evaluation.
